EXTENSION_NAME.description: The full name for this browser extension.

EXTENSION_DESCRIPTION.message: 通过Sonatype Platform浏览器扩展来达到“安全左移”——扫描开源仓库以检测已知漏洞。

RELEASE_VERSION.description: The release version of this browser extension

ALL_VERSIONS.description: The list of all the available component versions

CATALOG_DATE.description: The date this component version was add to the Sonatype data catalog

SONATYPE_IQ_SERVER.description: Branded product name for Sonatype IQ Server

LINK_BUG_REPORT.description: Link text used for reporting a bug.

LINK_FEATURE_REQUEST.description: Link text used for making a feature request.

LINK_TEXT_HERE.description: Link text used for generic link to somehting [here].

HELP_TILE_TITLE_WHERE_TO_GET_HELP.message: 我应该在哪里寻求帮助？
HELP_TILE_TITLE_WHERE_TO_GET_HELP.description: Title of the first Help Tile

HELP_TILE_CONTENT_WHERE_TO_GET_HELP.message: 我们提供了Sonatype Platform浏览器扩展的详细文档。
HELP_TILE_CONTENT_WHERE_TO_GET_HELP.description: Content for the first Help Tile

HELP_TILE_TITLE_FEATURE_REQUEST.description: Title of the first Help Tile

HELP_TILE_CONTENT_FEATURE_REQUEST.message: 我们提供了Sonatype Platform浏览器扩展的详细文档。我们非常重视您的反馈。您可以在GitHub上打开一个Issue，分享您的想法或疑问，或联系您专属的客户成功代表。
HELP_TILE_CONTENT_FEATURE_REQUEST.description: Content for the first Help Tile

HELP_TILE_TITLE_RAISE_BUG.message: 我认为我发现了一个错误 - 我应该告诉谁？
HELP_TILE_TITLE_RAISE_BUG.description: Title of the first Help Tile

HELP_TILE_CONTENT_RAISE_BUG.message: 我们非常重视反馈。如果您认为发现了一个错误，请打开一个Github Issue，并提供尽可能多的信息，包括：
HELP_TILE_CONTENT_RAISE_BUG.description: Content for the first Help Tile

HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_1.message: 您的Web浏览器详细信息（名称和版本）
HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_1.description: First item of detail we request when raising a Bug

HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_2.message: 您已安装的Sonatype Platform浏览器扩展版本
HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_2.description: Second item of detail we request when raising a Bug

HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_3.description: Third item of detail we request when raising a Bug

HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_4.description: Fourth item of detail we request when raising a Bug

HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_5.description: Fifth item of detail we request when raising a Bug

HIGHEST_POLICY_THREAT_LEVELS.description: Header when displaying the highest threat levels by policy

HIGHEST_POLICY_THREAT_LEVELS_TOOLTIP.message: 应用程序$APP_NAME$的最高$POLICY_TYPE_LABEL$策略威胁级别
HIGHEST_POLICY_THREAT_LEVELS_TOOLTIP.description: The release version of this browser extension

LEGAL_EFFECTIVE_LICENSE.description: The effective license of the component

LEGAL_OBSERVED_LICENSE.description: The observed license of the component

LEGAL_DECLARED_LICENSE.description: The declared license of the component

LEGAL_TABLE_THREAT_GROUP.description: The column header in the security table for threat group

LEGAL_TABLE_LICENSE.description: The column header in the security table for license

LEGAL_TABLE_COPY_TEXT.description: The column header in the security table for copy text

LEGAL_COPY_TEXT_TOOLTIP.description: Tooltip for the copy license text button

OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_PAGE_TITLE.message: 感谢您安装Sonatype Platform浏览器扩展
OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_PAGE_TITLE.description: Page Title for Options page upon first installation

OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_SUB_HEADING_GETTING.description: Sub Heading on Options Page in Install Mode

OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_P_GETTING_STARTED.message: 请按照以下步骤将此扩展连接到您的Sonatype IQ服务器。
OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_P_GETTING_STARTED.description: Description paragraph on Options Page in Install Mode

OPTIONS_PAGE_TAB_SONATYPE_CONFIGURATION.description: Options Tab name for Sonatype Configuration

OPTIONS_PAGE_TAB_GENERAL_CONFIGURATION.description: Options Tab name for General Configuration

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_1.message: 输入您的Sonatype IQ服务器URL，然后授予此扩展与您的Sonatype IQ服务器进行通信所需的权限。
OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_1.description: First point of configuration for Sonatype IQ Server

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_BUTTON_GRANT_PERMI.message: 授予权限给您的Sonatype IQ服务器

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_2.message: 提供您的Sonatype IQ服务器的用户名和令牌。然后连接以检索可用的应用程序列表。
OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_2.description: Second point of configuration for Sonatype IQ Server

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_3.message: 从您的Sonatype IQ服务器上可用的应用程序列表中选择一个应用程序。
OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_3.description: Third point of configuration for Sonatype IQ Server

OPTIONS_PAGE_TOOLTIP_WHY_APPLICATION.message: 组件将受到评估的应用程序策略。
OPTIONS_PAGE_TOOLTIP_WHY_APPLICATION.description: Tooltip as to why an Application is to be selected

OPTIONS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE.message: 恭喜！您已成功通过Sonatype IQ服务器进行身份验证并选择了一个应用程序！您可以关闭此浏览器标签以继续。
OPTIONS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE.description: Success message to display once Sonatype IQ has been configured

OPTIONS_INFO_MESSAGE_CHOOSE_APPLICATION.message: 请从上面的列表中选择一个应用程序。
OPTIONS_INFO_MESSAGE_CHOOSE_APPLICATION.description: Info message to direct to choose an Application

OPTIONS_ERROR_MESSAGE_UNAUTHENTICATED.description: Error message showed if Sonatype IQ credentials are incorrect

POPUP_TAB_POLICY.description: Policy violations top-level tab in Popup. All policy violations for this component.

POPUP_TAB_REMEDIATION.description: List of recommended version as well as a complete list of the versions available.

POPUP_TAB_VERSIONS.description: List of all versions available if there are no policy violations

POPUP_TAB_POLICY_TOOLIP.message: Sonatype Lifecycle应用程序评估违规策略：$APPNAME$
